talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of temporal energy that deals 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage, and reduces all of the target's stats by 9, 12, 13, 15, 16 for 3 turns.

At talent level 4 you may project a second bolt.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Turn Back the Clock

talents.info_text:
Reverts the minds of all creatures in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone to an infantile state, in effect confusing them (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% to act randomly) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Temporal Fugue

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 distortion of time, which deals 90, 122, 146, 167, 186 stacking temporal damage over 3 turns to all other creatures. The effect lasts 7, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Ashes to Ashes
Body Reversion
talents.info_text:
You revert your body to a previous state, healing yourself for 307, 416, 500, 572, 635 life and removing 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 physical status effects (both good and bad).

The amount of life healed will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

name: Age Manipulation
description: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.

talents.message: @Source@ has created a bubble of slow time.

talents.name: Anomaly Haste

description: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.
name: anomalies

description: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.
name: chronomancy

talents.name: Precognition
talents.info_text:
You peer into the future, allowing you to explore your surroundings for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns. When Precognition expires, you'll return to the point in time you first cast the spell. Dying with precognition active will end the spell prematurely.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Splitting the timeline is difficult, you will only be protected after the current turn ends.

talents.name: Foresight
talents.info_text: When the duration of your Precognition expires, you'll be given a vision of your surroundings, sensing terrain, enemies, objects, and traps in a 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 radius.

You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Moment of Prescience
Spin Fate
talents.info_text:
You've learned to make minor corrections in how future events unfold. Each time you make a saving throw, all your saves are increased by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 (stacking up to a maximum increase of 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for each value).

The effect will last 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns, but the duration will refresh everytime it's reapplied.

description: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.
name: energy

talents.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming energy damage (all except mind and physical damage), reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Energy Decomposition
Entropic Field
talents.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 41%, 53%, 62%, 69%, 76%, and increases your physical resistance by 20%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.

You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns. For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

The number of talents affected scales with your Paradox.
talents.name: Energy Absorption
Redux
talents.info_text:
You may recast the next activated chronomancy spell (up to talent level 1.3, 2.6, 3.9, 5.2, 6.5) that you cast within the next 5 turns on the turn following its initial casting.

The Paradox cost of the initial spell will be paid each time it is cast, and the second casting will still consume a turn.

This spell takes no time to cast.

Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 radius cone, dealing 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 physical damage and knocking back creatures caught in the area. This deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a gravity spike in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 that moves all targets towards the spells center and inflicts 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 physical damage. This deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Spike

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 distortion of gravity, knocking back and dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage to all creatures inside it. The effect lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Field

talents.info_text:
Increases local gravity of an area, doing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage with a chance to pin in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage done will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Well

name: gravity
description: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.

talents.info_text:
Fires a beam that turns matter into dust, inflicting 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Dust to Dust

talents.info_text:
Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 32, 44, 53, 60, 67 and inflicting 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Carbon Spikes

talents.info_text:
Destabilizes the target, inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage per turn for 10 turns. If the target dies while destabilized, it will explode, doing 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage in a radius of 4.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Destabilize

talents.info_text:
Attempts to pull the target apart at a molecular level, inflicting 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 temporal damage and 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 physical damage. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Quantum Spike deals 50% additional damage to targets affected by temporal destabilization and/or continuum destabilization.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Quantum Spike
Spacetime Tuning
talents.info_text:
Use to set your preferred Paradox. While resting you'll adjust your Paradox towards this number over 19, 18, 15, 13, 10 turns.

The time it takes you to adjust your Paradox scales down with your Spellpower to a minimum of 10 turns.

Preferred Paradox : 0

Paradox effect multiplier : 100%

Willpower failure modifier : 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

Paradox after Willpower : 290, 275, 250, 225, 200

Current Failure chance : 3%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 0%

Current Anomaly chance : 0%

Current Backfire chance : 0%

description: Create loopholes in the laws of spacetime.

talents.name: Paradox Mastery
talents.info_text: You've learned to focus your control over the spacetime continuum, and quell anomalous effects. Increases your Temporal resistance by 12%, 22%, 29%, 35%, 41%, extends the duration of the Static History stability effect by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3 turns, and increases your effective willpower for failure, anomaly, and backfire calculations by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58%.

Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline. Its resistances will be reduced by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and if you manage to kill it while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox and the resistance penalty will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Cease to Exist

talents.info_text:
You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Fade From Time

talents.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Paradox Clone

name: paradox

talents.name: Weapon Folding
talents.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 temporal damage to your strikes (31, 42, 51, 58, 64 for ammo) and reducing your Paradox by 0.8, 1.4, 2.0, 2.6, 3.1 every time you land an attack (1.6, 2.9, 4.1, 5.2, 6.2 for ammo).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

talents.info_text:
You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 3, 4, 6, 7, 8. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Swap

talents.info_text: Space bends around you, giving you a 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% chance to displace half of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within a radius of 2, 6, 8, 10, 11.
talents.name: Displace Damage

talents.range: <acronym class="talent-variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">3.0, 4.0, 4.0, 5.0, 5.0</acronym>
talents.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range. You move to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 4 turns and inflicts 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to everything in the path.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower, and the range will increase with the talent level.
talents.name: Temporal Wake

name: Spacetime Folding
description: Mastery of folding points in space.
Weave the threads of spacetime and correct the damage you've caused through your meddling.
name: Spacetime Weaving

talents.range: <acronym class="talent-variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">3.0, 4.0, 6.0, 7.0, 8.0</acronym>
talents.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight. Additional talent points increase the range.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Dimensional Step

talents.info_text:
Randomly teleports all targets within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Targets will be teleported between 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 tiles from their current location.

The teleport range will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Banish

talents.range: <acronym class="talent-variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">10.0, 11.0, 12.0, 12.0, 13.0</acronym>
talents.info_text:
You fold the space between yourself and a random point within range, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported to the other. The wormholes will last 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

At level 4, you may choose the exit location target area (radius 6, 4, 3, 2, 2). The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Wormhole
Spacetime Mastery
talents.info_text: Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 3, 6, 8, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.
Increases your movement speed by 18%, 30%, 41%, 51%, 60%, and switching between already equipped weapon sets (default hotkey q) no longer takes a turn.
talents.name: Celerity

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all creatures in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The stun duration will scale with your Paradox, and the damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Stop

talents.info_text:
Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 41%, 53%, 60%, 60%, 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Slow

talents.info_text:
Increases your global speed by 53%, 66%, 76%, 84%, 91% for the next 4 game turns. Each time you move with this effect active, you'll leave behind an image of yourself for two turns that may draw enemy attacks.

The speed increase will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Haste

name: Speed Control
description: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.

talents.info_text:
You've learned to boost your strength through your control of the spacetime continuum. Increases your Strength and your Physical Save by 12, 17, 20, 24, 27.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Strength of Purpose
Invigorate
talents.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, you recover 1.9, 3.2, 4.3, 5.1, 5.9 stamina each turn and all other talents on cooldown will refresh twice as fast as usual.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.

You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 16, 19, 23, 26.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Quantum Feed

talents.info_text:
For the next 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, you convert all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over six turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Damage Smearing

name: Temporal Combat
description: A blend of chronomancy and physical combat.

talents.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Static History

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 temporal damage, if the target fails a spell save. If your target survives, it will be removed from time for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox. The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Skip

talents.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a nova around you, in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7. Affected targets will take 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 temporal damage, as well as 15%, 17%, 18%, 19%, 20% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The percentage and damage scales with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Echoes From The Past
Temporal Reprieve
talents.info_text:
Manipulate the flow of time, reducing the cooldown of all your talents on cooldown by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns, and reducing the duration of most status effects currently affecting you (good or bad) by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The effect will scale with your Paradox.

name: Time Travel
description: Travel through time yourself, or send your foes into the future.
Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.

talents.name: Gather the Threads
talents.info_text:
You begin to gather energy from other timelines. Your Spellpower will increase by 11, 21, 29, 37, 45 on the first turn and 1.83, 3.46, 4.88, 6.20, 7.43 more each additional turn.

The effect ends either when you cast a spell, or after five turns.

Eacn turn the effect is active, your Paradox will be reduced by 4, 8, 12, 15, 18.

This spell will not break Spacetime Tuning, nor will it be broken by activating Spacetime Tuning.

Creates a wake of temporal energy that deals 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage in a beam, as you attempt to rethread the timeline. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 3 turns.

Each target you hit with Rethread will reduce your Paradox by 1.6, 2.9, 4.1, 5.2, 6.2.

The damage will increase with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Rethread

talents.info_text:
Pulls a medium, medium, big, big, huge size or smaller copy of the target from another timeline; the copy stays for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. The copy and the target will be compelled to attack each other immediately.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Temporal Clone

talents.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present. Note that seeing visions of your own death can still be fatal.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: See the Threads

name: Timeline Threading
